item.title: Cybersecurity 100822
item.description: Terms: Defence in Depth Multiple layers of security Availibility Accesible only to authorized perople Confeditializty Protect personal privacy THink Like an Adversary Securing Data Data sitting on your computer or on a portable medium Attackers need accesss to the storage medium, be it remote or not
